name: SPACE SURVIVAL (itch) (iChoica)
description:
Space Survival is a fun sci-fi adventure first person shooter game where you are trapped in a spaceship and have to gain control of it somehow. Your goal is to fight off all the robots, navigate the corridors and unlock all doors to reach the control room and save yourself.

This demo consists of one level. 

Controls are:

 WASD to move

MOUSE to look around/aim

LEFT CLICK to shoot

SPACE to jump

SHIFT to run

SCROLL/ 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 to switch weapons

H to heal 

E to interact
